codeGet:
SELECT smrprle_program, 
       smrprle_program_desc,  
       stvdegc_desc,  
       stvmajr_desc,
       stvrate_code||' ('||stvrate_desc||')' as STVRATE_DESC
  FROM smrprle,
       stvdegc,
       stvmajr,
       stvrate,
       sovlcur t1,
       sovlfos t2,
       spriden t3
 WHERE nvl(:program, smrprle_program) = smrprle_program
       AND spriden_pidm = sovlcur_pidm
       AND spriden_pidm = sovlfos_pidm
       AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL
       AND spriden_pidm = :parm_user_pidm
       AND (   sovlcur_term_code_end IS NULL
            OR sovlcur_term_code_end >=
                  (SELECT MAX (stvterm_code)
                     FROM stvterm
                    WHERE     stvterm_start_date <= SYSDATE
                          AND stvterm_end_date >= SYSDATE))
       AND sovlcur_lmod_code = sb_curriculum_str.f_learner
       AND sovlcur_cact_code = 'ACTIVE'
       AND sovlcur_current_cde = 'Y'
       AND sovlcur_term_code =
              (SELECT MAX (s1.sovlcur_term_code)
                 FROM sovlcur s1
                WHERE     s1.sovlcur_pidm = t1.sovlcur_pidm
                      AND s1.sovlcur_program = t1.sovlcur_program
                      AND s1.sovlcur_lmod_code = t1.sovlcur_lmod_code
                      AND s1.sovlcur_current_cde = t1.sovlcur_current_cde
                      AND s1.sovlcur_cact_code = t1.sovlcur_cact_code
                      AND s1.sovlcur_term_code = t1.sovlcur_term_code
                      AND s1.sovlcur_term_code <=
                             (SELECT MAX (stvterm_code)
                                FROM stvterm
                               WHERE     stvterm_start_date <= SYSDATE
                                     AND stvterm_end_date >= SYSDATE))
       AND sovlfos_SEQNO =
              (SELECT MAX (sovlfos_SEQNO)
                 FROM sovlfos
                WHERE     sovlfos_PIDM = T2.sovlfos_PIDM
                      AND sovlfos_LCUR_SEQNO = T2.sovlfos_LCUR_SEQNO
                      AND sovlfos_CACT_CODE = 'ACTIVE'
                      AND sovlfos_CURRENT_CDE = 'Y'
                      AND sovlfos_CSTS_CODE = 'INPROGRESS'
                      AND sovlfos_LFST_CODE = 'MAJOR')
       AND sovlcur_SEQNO =
              (SELECT MAX (sovlcur_SEQNO)
                 FROM sovlcur
                WHERE     sovlcur_PIDM = T1.sovlcur_PIDM
                      AND sovlcur_TERM_CODE = T1.sovlcur_TERM_CODE
                      AND sovlcur_PROGRAM = T1.sovlcur_PROGRAM
                      AND sovlcur_LMOD_CODE = SB_CURRICULUM_STR.F_LEARNER
                      AND sovlcur_CACT_CODE = 'ACTIVE'
                      AND sovlcur_CURRENT_CDE = 'Y')
       AND sovlfos_lcur_seqno = sovlcur_seqno
       AND sovlfos_cact_code = 'ACTIVE'
       AND sovlfos_current_cde = 'Y'
       AND sovlfos_csts_code = 'INPROGRESS'
       AND sovlfos_lfst_code = 'MAJOR'
       AND smrprle_program = sovlcur_program
       AND stvdegc_code = sovlcur_degc_code
       AND stvmajr_code = sovlfos_majr_code
       AND stvrate_code =
              NVL (
                 sovlcur_rate_code,
                 (SELECT sgbstdn_rate_code
                    FROM sgbstdn
                   WHERE     sgbstdn_pidm = sovlcur_pidm
                         AND sgbstdn_term_code_eff =
                                (SELECT MAX (sgbstdn_term_code_eff)
                                   FROM sgbstdn
                                  WHERE     sgbstdn_pidm = sovlcur_pidm
                                        AND sovlcur_lmod_code =
                                               sb_curriculum_str.f_learner
                                        AND sovlcur_current_cde = 'Y'
                                        AND sovlcur_cact_code = 'ACTIVE'
                                        AND sgbstdn_term_code_eff IN
                                               (SELECT stvterm_code
                                                  FROM stvterm
                                                 WHERE stvterm_start_date <=
                                                          SYSDATE))))
